name: Mining Simulator
description: Mining Simulator is a fun game that you should buy pls I need food I spent all my money on my computer anyway in this game you go down multiple layers including the Deep Slate(was not inspired by Minecraft) and the Abyss listing just a couple areas adventure into the deepest of places collect stone and sell to buy upgrades to make yourself more powerful to mine more stuff like Obamium once you have enough money you can rebirth, so you do everything all over but with boost so you can further increase your wealth.
